description:
As the gang nears the Fire Dragon temple, they find they can`t use their magic! To get their powers back, Inverse unleashes the Dragon Slave - and as usual, does more harm than good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les mésaventures de l`errance ? Voyage incontrôlable vers le temple !
Rurou Ruten? Bousou Shinden no Tabi o!
Wandering Around? The Runaway Shrine Takes a Trip!
Заплутали? Беглый храм отправляется в путь!
流浪流転? 暴走神殿の旅を!
